description: Gets information about the specified software package. Requires permission to access the GetPackage action.

parameters.name: packageName
parameters.description: The name of the target software package.

nested_items.name: packageName
nested_items.description: The name of the software package.

nested_items.name: defaultVersionName
nested_items.description: The name of the default package version.

nested_items.name: creationDate
nested_items.description: The date the package was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date when the package was last updated.
